p: Both DNA and RNA viruses have been reported infecting Anopheles species, although reports of RNA viruses are more prevalent. RNA viruses include Alphavirus, Phlebovirus, Flavivirus, Orthobunyavirus, Dicistrovirus, Cypovirus, Mononegavirus, Totivirus, and Orbivirus genera. DNA viruses include Densovirus, Poxvirus, Iridovirus ( Table 1). Anopheles viruses have been reported on all continents except the poles ( Figure 1).
